title: Index of Total Advertising for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Four Variables--(1)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1914-1943 (2)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1943-1946 (3)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1944-1953 (4)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1953-1958. Source: 1953-1956 Data From Mccann-Erickson, Inc. And Monthly Issues Of "Printers' Ink" Thereafter.

This NBER data series m06058d appears on the NBER website in Chapter 6 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter06.html.

NBER Indicator: m06058d
